Cody Edwards (born ) is an American college football coach. He is the head football coach for Concord University, a position he has held since 2025. He also coached for Eastside High School, Emory & Henry, Tennessee, John Carroll, Royal Palm Beach High School, The John Cooper School, Keiser, Tusculum, and Western Carolina. He played college football for Virginia–Wise as a wide receiver.
